10億ぐらいでもいける

```
time echo 1000 1000000000 | opy -m numpy 'B:{import numpy as np;};{x=np.linspace(0,F1,F2);};E:{print(x.shape)}'
(1000000000,)

real	0m2.310s
user	0m2.120s
sys	0m0.984s

time echo 100 1000000000 | opy -m numpy 'B:{import numpy as np;};{x=np.linspace(0,F1,F2);};E:{print(x.shape)}'
(1000000000,)

real	0m2.300s
user	0m2.067s
sys	0m0.976s

time echo 10 1000000000 | opy -m numpy 'B:{import numpy as np;};{x=np.linspace(0,F1,F2);};E:{print(x.shape)}'
(1000000000,)

real	0m2.304s
user	0m2.096s
sys	0m1.004s

time echo 1 1000000000 | opy -m numpy 'B:{import numpy as np;};{x=np.linspace(0,F1,F2);};E:{print(x.shape)}'
(1000000000,)

real	0m2.311s
user	0m2.140s
sys	0m0.967s
```
